name: Grand Designs Australia
description: Grand Designs Australia is a TV series starring Peter Maddison. Each episode is about the host visiting people who have a dream to build a house and how they bring the build to fruition. We see their trials and tribulations along...

review.name: Poor host spoils it
review.reviewBody: I always enjoy Grand Designs (UK) and Grand Designs New Zealand, and Grand Designs Australia features homes that are interesting enough, but the host, Peter Maddison, just doesn't have what it takes for this role. I keep saying very rude things to the television and watch only reluctantly since I know this is the reaction he will evoke from me. What a shame.
